participant_1.background:
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i am fairly conservative in politics.
i am twenty years old.
i love to eat sushi and pizza.
I value honesty and trust in my relationships.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
I'm comfortable with my own company and don't need music to keep me entertained.
i like katy perry as a musician.
i pray to god for my family every morning.
I am a single, asthmatic web designer.

content.text: Doing well, thank you for asking! What about you?
I am doing well too, thanks for asking! I am just getting started on my day.
That's great to hear! I hope you have a productive day.
Thank you, I appreciate that! What are your plans for today?
I am going to be playing soccer with my nieces and nephews. I love spending time with them.
That sounds fun! I love playing soccer too.
It is a great way to get exercise and have fun at the same time.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies?
I enjoy web design and listening to music. I am also a single asthmatic web designer.
That's cool! I am also a web designer. What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a variety of music, but I am a big fan of Katy Perry. What about you?
I like a lot of different music too, but I am a big fan of rock and roll.
That's cool! I like some rock and roll too.
